description: Event published when a Choria Machine transitions between states
title: io.choria.machine.watcher.nagios.v1.state

perfdata.description: The perfdata produced by the plugin if any

unit.description: Unit value supplied by the plugin

value.description: The parsed numeric value, not interpreted for the unit

id.description: Unique instance ID that produced the message

identity.description: The configured identity of the component hosting the machine

version.description: The version of the machine that received the transition

timestamp.description: The time the state was gathered, UTC timezone, unix format with nano seconds

machine.description: The name of the machine that received the transition

name.description: The name of the nagios watcher

type.description: The type of watcher issuing the event

plugin.description: The Nagios plugin being run and it's arguments

status.description: The current state in human friendly format

check_time.description: The time the last check was performed in Unix time format

runtime.description: How long the last check took in seconds

items.description: Historical values for the check value

execute.description: The time the check was executed

status.description: The status of this check run in Nagios exit code format
